text: The Mysterious City is a 1988 Cambodian-North Korean film directed by Norodom Sihanouk, former King of Cambodia. The film tells the story of a Cambodian archaeologist setting out to find a mysterious temple discovered by a woodcutter within the Dângrêk Mountains. It is Sihanouk's first among four films to be shot in North Korea. ==Cast== *Kim Weun as Prince Indra-Putra, an archaeologist *Sin Myeung-ouk as Lieutenant Rithy *Jang Seun-hi as Queen Shiva-Putri *Yu Won-joun as General Brahma-Sena *Hwang Hak-youn as Sok, a woodcutter ==Production== Filming began in May 1988 and ended in June the same year. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1988 films Category:Cambodian films Category:Films set in Cambodia Category:Films set in the 1950s Category:Films shot in North Korea Category:North Korean films
title: The Mysterious City
